name: Fire Escape (itch) (Footedspark)
description:
1-2 Players climb as high as they can while avoiding the rising fire and collapsing buildings. Wall jump off buildings and collect points to reach a new high score as things slowly collapse faster and faster. Currently 2 abilities Dash and Building. Dash gives a quick burst of speed in the direction you are facing. While the  building ability places a slow-falling building under your feet giving you time to decide your move.

Controls:

Mouse & Keyboard:

Space - Jump

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move left and Right

CTRL/Left Click - Ability Button

Controller (Xbox):

A - Jump

Left Joystick - Move Left and Right

X - Ability Button
